Articles.Content:
Hello!

I just wanted your opinions on the next version of the KSP!

What do you think they'll add with the next version?

I'm sure I can't be the only one who would see this as entirely too soon to start discussing the next version. We haven't heard the slightest peep out of Squad regarding it yet; everyone (including most of the playerbase) are wrestling with 0.90.

Let's give it a couple weeks, at leastÃ¢â‚¬â€¹.
